description.en: World's most popular MMORPG, "Hidden Ego"… One day, the dragon named "Ignis", who was nothing more than a monster, becomes self-aware. And her brother "Tafras" is raided by the strongest guild, composed of 6 top-rankers. After Tafras' defeat, he's divided into 6 items, which is taken by each of the 6 guild members. And Ignis must defeat them all and unite those items in order to resurrect her brother! This is the story of a game monster's vengeance – Dragon Ego! genre: webtoon; shounen publisher: FANSIA reader age group: All story & art by Takoongi

Yui, a high school girl is abducted to a lonely Island in the middle of the ocean. Eight childhood friends of her who were raised in the same orphanage are gathered on that island too. Now that she meets them again for the first time in a long time, they've all become first rate criminals!! Moreover, a device makes Yui experience intense arousal at regular intervals, and if they don't make her come she will die. And there are further secrets on that Island: continuous arousal crime suspense!!
description.ja: 絶海の孤島に拉致された女子高生・結衣。その島には、同じ孤児院で育った８人の幼馴染も集められていた。久しぶりに会う彼らは全員、今や一級犯罪者!!　更に結衣の体は定期的に発情し、彼らにイかせてもらわないと死に至る仕掛けが!!　彼らの中から一人を選べば島から脱出できるといわれた結衣。しかしこの島には更なる秘密が…!?　話題沸騰！　連続発情クライムサスペンス！

description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

description.en: Seven siblings born in England are characterized by immortality. The underworld, a corrupt hospital, and an international military organization target them as they fulfill mankind's dream! ! For the first time in hundreds of years, a family begins to live together, dancing with fate even if they live for a thousand years...!

title.en: The Ranker's Guide to Live an Ordinary Life

altTitles.en: A Guide to the Right Life for Rankers

description.en:
The first S-class Awakened is really a third-rate student?!

In the 21st century, the world became a 'fantasy'. In a South Korea filled with despair, S-classes have descended! The greatest of them - Witch Queen Jyo!

"Goddess Jyo... Queen Jyo... Who are you...? Who could it be?"

The true identity of the savior who has been shrouded in mystery for 10 years. Her identity? Gyung Jyo, a third-rate student, who's unable to make outgoing calls due to her mother's anger.and on the verge of being strangled and trapped in the abyss.

She was leading a peaceful and ordinary life as Korea's top unemployed person, however...

[The rankings are being updated.]
[Your current ranking has dropped to 2nd place.] 

"!?"

"I know who you are, Witch Queen."

Baek Dohyun, a regressor, appears in front of Gyung Jyo!

Will Gyung Jyo, an S-class Munchkin ranker, be able to maintain her comfortable and lazy tyrant life, as her well-rolling life turns upside down into the position of the world's savior?

In the feudal era of Japan, Ogami Itto is the elite executioner for the Shogun until the ruthless Yagyu clan frames him in an attempt to gain the position. His name dishonored and his wife murdered, Itto and his infant son Daigoro wander Japan as an assassin for hire, named Lone Wolf and Cub. Ultimately, Ogami Itto strives for revenge against the Yagyu clan.

altTitles.ja: しゅがー・みーつ・がーる！

description.en:
A Sweet and Juicy Girls' Comedy~

Featuring:

Sato Kanna, daughter of a yakuza boss, she's known for being loyal to her friends and her slightly delinquent appearance.

And Mochizuki Mito, class president and the school's most envied upon young lady.

Just what unexpected secrets did these two girls found out about each other!?
description.es: Una dulce y jugosa comedia de chicas~ Presentación: Sato Kanna, hija de un jefe yakuza, es conocida por ser leal a sus amigos y por su aspecto ligeramente delincuente. Y Mochizuki Mito, presidenta de la clase y la joven más envidiada de la escuela. ¿Qué secretos inesperados habrán descubierto estas dos chicas la una sobre la otra?
description.es-la: Una dulce y jugosa comedia de chicas~ Presentación: Sato Kanna, hija de un jefe yakuza, es conocida por ser leal a sus amigos y por su aspecto ligeramente delincuente. Y Mochizuki Mito, presidenta de la clase y la joven más envidiada de la escuela. ¿Qué secretos inesperados habrán descubierto estas dos chicas la una sobre la otra?

description.en: Born to a mother who was sealed in a mysterious ark with ten longevity on it, Arachi, who has tremendous power, hides her power and is now the wife of HS group and an ordinary housewife. While leaving for Gangwon-do with her family, they got hit by a truck and her two sons Soo-hyuk and Seon-mi were seriously injured and lost consciousness. In order to protect her precious family, Arachi borrows the status of Sunmi, instead of Hwang Shin-hye, and awakens her past power to find the person behind the attack. Arachi, she’s coming out into the world!

I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge!  
  
Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion.  
  
When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact?  
  
*[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*
description.es-la: No me puedo creer que mi Ojou-sama sea tan grande! Fujido Oriko es la exuberante hija del Conglomerado Fujido, un grupo que tiene un monopolio de la industria de máquinas expendedoras en Japón. Y a su lado está su mayordomo personal, el excéntrico Dr. Sebastian. Cuando un monstruo ataca de repente la ciudad, el Dr. Sebastian le da a su ojou-sama una bebida experimental que su equipo de I+D había estado desarrollando. Como resultado, ella crece hasta convertirse en una giganta! Será capaz de aplacar la ira de los invasores o, al menos, mantener intacta su dignidad?

description.en:
Official 4-koma comic for the award-winning game, [Genshin Impact](https://genshin.mihoyo.com/). 
A relaxing trip in Teyvat ><, let's go together!
description.ru: Расслабься путешествуя по Тэйвату >.< идём со мной!

title.en: Dore dake Doryoku Shite mo Mannen Level 0 no Ore wa Tsuihou Sareta: Shin no Teki to Yobareta Shounen wa, Shachiku Megami to Deatte Saikyou no Chikara wo Te ni Ireru

altTitles.en: No matter how hard I tried, I was banished from level 0 for a thousand years ~The boy who was called the enemy of god meets the goddess of company slaves and gains the strongest power~

altTitles.ja: どれだけ努力しても万年レベル0の俺は追放された ~神の敵と呼ばれた少年は、社畜女神と出会って最強の力を手に入れる~

description.en:
No matter how hard he tries, his level does not rise, and the adventurer boy Tinto is called [God's Enemy].
The goddess Esther appears before him, who is banished from the party he belongs to.

A thousand years ago, a war erupted between humans, backed by "Lifespans," and the gods. In this war, there was one god who fought on the side of humans, her name was "Ogu."

The defeated "Lifespans" were divided into ten thousand insects and scattered across the world, while Ogu, the god, found herself caught in the cycle of reincarnation.

After a thousand years, Ogu is reborn in the body of a young girl named "Bari," and the "Lifespans" show signs of resurrection as well.

Two horrific wars must not happen again! Bari and Ogu embark on a journey to thwart the plans of the "Lifespans" and find the divine beings.

Will Bari be able to save humanity and prove her existence on this journey?

title.en: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.

altTitles.ja: 地元のいじめっ子達に仕返ししようとしたら、別の戦いが始まった。

altTitles.zh: 本想报复以前欺负我的孩子王，另一场战斗却开始了。

altTitles.en: When Trying to Get Back at the Hometown Bullies, Another Battle Began.

description.en:
Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games.

Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them.

As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...!

But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected....
description.vi: Oneshot chính thức được làm thành series của tác giả Matsumoto Kengo. Sau nhiều năm rời xa quê hương, Kotaro đã quay về để báo thù 3 kẻ bắt nạt từng khiến cậu khổ sở hồi cấp 1. Thế nhưng khi gặp lại 3 kẻ bắt nạt, những gì chờ đợt cậu lại vượt xa những gì cậu tưởng tượng...
description.pt-br: Os valentões locais atormentaram Kotaro quando ele era jovem. Eles eram o lutador habilidoso Akari. Kanae, um prodígio do basquete, e Shigure, um prodígio dos videogames. Todos os dias, Kotaro competia contra esses três caras em seus respectivos esportes com a intenção de vencer. Infelizmente, ele não era páreo para eles. No último ano do ensino médio, Kotaro agora tem outra oportunidade de enfrentá-los e exigir sua retribuição…! Mas ele descobrirá um segredo que nunca teria esperado…

title.en: Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei shitemita

altTitles.ja: 理系が恋に落ちたので証明してみた。

altTitles.ja-ro: Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei Shite Mita

altTitles.en: Science Fell in Love, so I Tried to Prove It
I Tried to Prove That Science Fell in Love
Science Has Fallen in Love, so We Tried to Prove It

altTitles.fr: J'ai essayé de prouver que la science était tombée amoureuse

altTitles.ru: Наука влюблена и мы докажем это
Учёные влюблены и намерены доказать это научно
Я пытался доказать, что наука влюбилась

altTitles.th: พิสูจน์นิยามความรักด้วยหลักวิชาสายวิทย์

altTitles.zh: 理科生坠入情网，故尝试证明。
试证明理科生已坠入情网。

altTitles.zh-hk: 理科生墜入情網，故嘗試證明。
試證明理科生已墜入情網。

description.en: Yukimura Shinya and Himuro Ayame are two scientists that want to find out if love can be solved by a scientific theory. These two scientists also have feelings for each other and want to be able to solve their true feelings through similar theoretical facts. With this perfect opportunity, these scientists will attempt to solve the theory of the love they express for each other.
description.ru: Химуро Аямэ и Юкимура Шинья ну просто обожают точные науки. Им надо, чтобы всё имело научное обоснование, ведь без этого нельзя быть уверенным ни в чём. Ох уж эти ученые, какие только эксперименты не придут в эти головы, чтобы доказать "любовь".

altTitles.ja: 健全な男の娘の絵を描いています

description.en:
“Yup! Just as slow as I thought.”

After retiring from public fighting and getting fired from underground fighting, 27 year old Tenma Nozomi's zest for life is gradually dwindling away. It's hard to be at the bottom with nowhere to go, and that's exactly where she and her two friends are. However, Nozomi hits upon an idea that may just solve all of their problems: they could make their own underground fighting circuit for women, and tap into an underexplored market. As good as that sounds, her insistence on including the unknown quantity Hongou Hina may prove to be more than she bargained for...

description.cs: Lidstvo bylo po stovky let utlačováno kvůli vzestupu a invazi našich přirozených nepřátel "démonů". Světu vládl "Velký král démonů" a jeho 47 "ďábelských vládců". Zatímco lidé žijí ve strachu, 47 lidí bylo vybráno z celého světa a zíkslai titul "Hrdinové" a připravují se na boj proti armádě velkého krále démonů. A nyní začíná plán jak zachránit lidstvo, jehož osud je teď na tenkém ledě.
description.en:
Centuries ago, humanity’s natural enemy, “Demons,” invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world, while the human race lives on in fear.

In desperation, a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom…or die trying!
___
Composition: [bose](https://mangadex.org/author/aa8eb4f2-d4a2-4c4e-b6e8-2394f3b09b71/bose)
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10569/episode/349625)
description.ja: 天敵“魔族”の台頭と侵攻により、人類が虐げられ続けて数百年。世界は“大魔王”と、その配下である47体の“魔王”により支配されていた。人々は怯えて暮らしながらも、世界中から選び抜かれた47人を“勇者”と名付け、魔王軍に対抗すべく準備を進めていた。そして今、人類の存亡を懸けた決死の作戦が始まろうとしていた―――。
description.ru:
Уже сотни лет человечество вынуждено существовать под гнётом своих естественных врагов — демонов, сумевших захватить мир. В их главе стоит Повелитель тьмы, и в подчинении его находятся сорок семь Королей.
Однако среди людей, чей дух сломлен вековым страхом, было отобрано столько же наречённых Героев, готовых сразиться с демонической армией. И, кажется, отчаянная борьба за судьбу человеческой расы начинается прямо сейчас...
description.pt-br: A humanidade foi oprimida por centenas de anos devido à ascensão e invasão do inimigo natural "demônios". O mundo era governado pelo "Grande Lorde Demônio" e seus 47 "Senhores Demônios". Enquanto as pessoas vivem com medo, 47 pessoas selecionadas de todo o mundo foram nomeadas "Heróis" e estão se preparando para lutar contra o exército do Rei Demônio. E agora, uma operação desesperada com a sobrevivência da humanidade em jogo estava prestes a começar.

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

description.en:
After something changed his life four years ago, Sunny has not left his house once, living in his own reclusive bubble. Hoping for a fresh start for her son, his mother decides to move their family out of town. 

However, when his childhood friend Kel re-enters his life, Sunny finds himself thrust back into a world he once knew. With only three days before the move, the duo come across familiar faces as they go through town — reawakening a dark past that Sunny has tried so hard to forget.

altTitles.ja: ミッドナイト・トレーニング・アワー

description.en: Mao is a new host struggling to climb the ranks. Confident in his looks, he still finds himself frustrated by the lack of requests. His complaints are overheard by Kanamori Hiyori, a staff member from another club, who sharply criticizes him. Indignant, Mao is taken aback when his boss reveals that Kanamori was once the top host and insists Mao take "special lessons" from him. Reluctantly, Mao agrees and starts to find a sense of accomplishment with each lesson. Gradually, he also becomes intrigued by Kanamori himself. Just as things start to improve, the man responsible for Kanamori quitting reappears...

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

altTitles.ja-ro: Aniki no Kanojo ni Naru, Onnanoko ni Nacchatta Otouto

altTitles.en: When I Returned Home for the First Time in a Long Time, My Brother Transformed Into a Girl

altTitles.ja: 久しぶりに実家に帰ったら弟がTSしてた。

altTitles.ja-ro: Hisashiburi ni Jikka ni Kaettara Otouto ga TS Shiteta.

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

[Fantia 18+ Content](https://mangadex.org/title/7a23de9c-01b8-43bd-ac38-0bfe0bebcc3b)
description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?

description.en:
Mari's girlfriend, Arisa, loses her memories of the past three years, including all memory of their life together.  
However, it turns out that being crazy in love with someone transcends all realms of possibility.
description.pt-br: A namorada de Mari, Arisa, perde a memória dos seus últimos três anos, incluindo o tempo que viveu ao lado de sua parceira. De qualquer forma, o amor entre as duas transcende os pequenos problemas e toda a loucura que isso envolve. Acompanhe o dia a dia do casal e suas situações cotidianas que, com certeza, merecem um pouco do seu tempo.

description.en:
Kaizaki Arata is a 27-year-old unemployed man who, after quitting his last job after three months, has failed every interview since. Enter Yoake Ryou; representative of the ReLIFE Organization. He offers Kaizaki a pill that changes his appearance to that of his 17-year-old self; thus, Kaizaki becomes the subject of a one-year experiment in which he begins his life as a third year high school student once again.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Eaststar Adhi Citra (2016)

description.de: Als Vampire ihre Chance auf ein normales Leben zerstören, sieht sich Hayan Park gezwungen, sich ihrer dunklen Seite hinzugeben, um die Welt von den grausamen Vampiren zu befreien, die vor 10 Jahren plötzlich aufgetaucht sind. Mithilfe eines Vampirjäger-Polizisten versucht Hayan, ihre Liebsten zu schützen, das Geheimnis ihrer Vergangenheit aufzudecken und Rache zu üben.
description.en:
When vampires destroy her chance to have the normal life she’s always wanted, Hayan is forced to draw on her darkest secret to rid the world of the merciless hunters that took it over 10 years ago. With the support of a rising star in the local police force, Hayan steps up to protect her loved ones, face her past, and get her revenge.

---

description.es: Cuando los vampiros destruyen su oportunidad de tener la vida normal que siempre quiso, Hayan utilizará su secreto más oscuro para liberar al mundo de los despiadados cazadores que lo controlan desde hace más de 10 años. Con la ayuda de la nueva promesa de las fuerzas policiales, Hayan protegerá a sus seres queridos, enfrentará a su pasado y obtendrá su venganza.
description.fa: ⁧در دنیایی که خون‌آشام‌ها در بین مردم ظهور کرده‌اند، هایان (به معنای سپید) علارغم مشکلاتش، تلاش می‌کند زندگیِ معمولی‌ای برای خود رقم بزند
description.fr: Park Hayan est un vampire de sang pur avec un cœur doux. Son seul souhait est de vivre en paix avec les humains. Mais pour les humains... les vampires ne sont que des êtres qui leur font peur. Au fur et à mesure que les vampires commettent des meurtres, les humains deviennent de plus en plus haineux. Park Hayan, pourra-t-elle s'intégrer dans la société et vivre en paix avec les humains comme elle le souhaitait ?
description.id: Aksi vampir modis dengan kisah cinta tragis...!
description.ja: 10年前からバンパイアが現れ殺人を犯すようになり、この世を恐怖に包んだ。白音は純血バンパイアである自分の正体を隠しながら過ごしてきたが、大切な人々を守るべく、“使者”と呼ばれる6人のバンパイアに立ち向かう。なぜか白音のことをバンパイアと見抜いた刑事・銀弥とのロマンスも…？今までにない凄絶アクションが幕を開く！
description.ko:
스타일리쉬 뱀파이어 액션!
그리고 처절한 로맨스..
description.pl: Kiedy wampiry niszczą jej szansę na normalne życie, którego zawsze pragnęła, Hayan jest zmuszona wykorzystać swój najciemniejszy sekret, aby pozbyć się świata bezlitosnych łowców, którzy przejęli go ponad 10 lat temu. Przy wsparciu wschodzącej gwiazdy lokalnej policji, Hayan podejmuje kroki, by chronić swoich bliskich, stawić czoła przeszłości i zemścić się.
description.ru: Корею поглотил хаос. Уже как десять лет вампиры терроризируют мирных граждан, а правительство бессильно. Пак Хаян (имя означает "белый") - 20-летняя студентка колледжа, желающая просто иметь друзей и проводить свои дни, как самый обычный человек, хоть и является вампиром. Все меняется, когда Хаян обнаруживают и на нее открывают охоту как люди, так и её сородичи.
description.th: "มนุษย์นั้นเสมือนดอกไม้แสนสวยที่มีมากมายหลายชนิด ส่วนฉันคือสิ่งที่ไม่สมควรจะไปอยู่รวมกับหมู่ดอกไม้นั้น" พัคฮายันแวมไพร์เลือดบริสุทธิ์ที่มีจิตใจที่อ่อนโยนและมีความหวังเพียงแค่อยากจะอยู่ร่วมกับมนุษย์อย่างสงบสุข แต่สำหรับมนุษย์แล้ว...พวกเขาหวาดกลัวแวมไพร์ที่มีพลังอำนาจเหนือตนเอง ยิ่งเกิดคดีฆาตกรรมจากพวกแวมไพร์มากขึ้นเท่าไหร่ มนุษย์ก็ยิ่งทวีความเกลียดชังมากขึ้นเท่านั้น ความหวังที่จะอยู่ร่วมกับมนุษย์อย่างสงบสุขของพัคฮายัน..จะมีทางเป็นจริงได้มั้ย?
description.zh:
即使是吸血鬼纵横的地狱，
我也会义无反顾的毁掉它！
朴夏妍作为天生的吸血鬼，有着比普通吸血鬼更强的力量，却梦想成为普通人类。有一天，她发现一位神秘帅哥故意接近她，还能听到她心里的声音。这个人究竟是谁？又会有怎样的事情发生？
description.zh-hk: 時髦的吸血鬼愛情動作漫畫！

description.en:
Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
description.pt: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?

Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?

description.en: All Kako wants is to have the important people to her smiling. She treasures her two childhood friends so much, which is why she won’t confess to Taisei about her feelings for him. One day, after Taisei’s recovery from an accident, he then tells Kahoko that he and Uina have now started dating. She believes that their relationship is “unbreakable”, or so she thought it was…
description.pt-br: Tudo que Kako quer é ter as pessoas importantes para ela sorrindo. Ela valoriza muito seus dois amigos de infância, e é por isso que ela não confessa a Taisei sobre seus sentimentos por ele. Um dia, após a recuperação de Taisei de um acidente, ele diz a Kako que ele e Uina começaram a namorar. Ela acredita que o relacionamento deles é “inquebrável”, ou então ela achava que era…

altTitles.ja-ro: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 7: Requiem of the Golden Witch

altTitles.ja: うみねこのなく頃に散　Episode7:Requiem of the golden witch

description.en: The time for logical debate and magical feints has come to an end; the revelation of the truth about Beatrice the Golden Witch is at hand. To facilitate this, game master Bernkastel has chosen Will Wright the Mage-Hunter to step onto her board and answer a single question: Who killed Beatrice? Joining him in the game is Lion Ushiromiya, Krauss's firstborn and heir, whose role is a mystery in its own right. Will's line of questioning draws together the stray strands from all the previous games, twisting them into a thread of truth, revisiting Kinzou's first encounter with the young Beatrice and working through the legends that have since sprung up around her... [Yen Press]
Even boy can be harassed.

Teen model Manatsu is almost attacked by a monster but is saved by the superhero Ultima. However, Manatsu has a target on her back after being splattered by the monster's blood!

A couple of girls from the enemy faction are fooling around with each other, Manatsu's mother is flirting with a female secret agent, and through it all, Manatsu and Ultima must have sex with each other...

A chaotic "Yuri x Gag x Hero" comic!

Lucentia is a woman who was forced to marry the emperor, but was accused of treason and beheaded. She managed to escape death thanks to a precognitive dream and fled to the enemy empire, where she became Rose Von Isaac, a rich and powerful merchant. But Lucentia could not escape her fate, as she was the only one who could save the Duke of Aytan, a legendary swordsman who had a secret that could change everything. She proposed that he be her guardian, but he asked her to be his lover.

Lucentia decided that she would no longer be manipulated by fate and that she would live her life as she wanted.

description.en:
Yuuta and Yui had their body swapped when Yuuta fell down from a tree.  
  
How will they co-operate in dealing with this as they grow up?  
  
[Original Web Comic](http://banbi.omiki.com/) (Raw)

description.en: Trouble always seems to follow the beautiful and sassy, Kaname Chidori. Though she is only a high-school student, Kaname is constantly the target of terrorism. Lucky for her though, the dreamy Sosuke, an undercover agent from Mithril, is one step behind her, ready to protect her at any cost. But will he be able to save her from harm every time she is in trouble?
A manga about the story of a 38-year-old salaryman named Kirin who is also a street racer.
Junghyun Kim, who had a normal upbringing, and his roommate Homo Kim.This is the sensitive, embarrassing story of these two who are different in every way.

description.en: "Lunatic Circus" is a story about the circus called "Lunatic Circus", which is said to be the best in post WWII Japan, which has achieved an incredibly rapid economic growth. The star of the circus, Ryunosuke, and all the other trapeze artists, are the protagonists of this manga. This is the story of their dreams, their fears, their struggles and their hopes.

description.ar:
أصبحت امرأة شريرة ماتت على يد زوجها في الرواية ، على وجه التحديد كشخصية داعمة تموت أثناء استخدامها كأداة للزواج السياسي من قبل والدها وشقيقها . وفي يوم من الأيام ، أحضر الأب أخيزا عريسها ... المشكلة أن الشخص الآخر هو الزوج الذي سيقتلني وأفضل فارس مقدس في الشمال الذي سيدمر الأسرة في المستقبل . أولا وقبل كل شيء ، يجب أن أجد طريقة للعيش . هناك العديد من الصعوبات مثل برودة الزوج ، وازدراء الدوق ، لكن يبدو أنه غير مؤذ للناس هنا . " لقد وقعت في حبك ! " لذا أرجوك أنقذني !

description.en:
In the original lines of the novel, I was a villainess—used as a political tool by my father and older brother—who ended up dying at the hands of my future husband.

To save his kingdom, my father desperately begged my fifth groom to take my hand in marriage. The problem is that the man I’m supposed to marry, the legendary knight of the North, is the same man who will end up murdering me and my entire family.

I have to find a way to survive.

Within the novel itself, there are many daunting challenges ahead of me: I have to find a way to save my husband’s little sister, win over my cold-hearted husband, and gain the support of the people of the North, all of whom currently despise me.

“I’m in love with you!”

So please, don’t kill me!

---
I thought I'd finally escaped my hellish life when I died in an airplane crash, but I fell into another nightmare when I awoke as Rudbeckia de Borgia, a minor villain from a historical novel destined to die at the hands of her husband, Iske van Omerta. Surviving with the dysfunctional Borgia family is hard enough, but now I have to marry the man who will kill me! Still, it’s okay, I just have to convince Iske, his family, and all his countrymen that I’m completely harmless! How hard can that be?

---

description.es:
Me convertí en Rudbekia, la villana dentro de una novela de fantasía que sería asesinada a manos de su marido. El maldito de mi padre, ya ha decidido con quien me volveré a casar a través de un matrimonio político. El principal problema, es que mi futuro esposo es quien me matara. Necesito encontrar una forma de sobrevivir. Si actuó inofensivamente ante la gente del Norte, si protejo a la hermana de mi marido, a quien maté en la historia original, y si finjo estar completamente enamorada de él, ¿tal vez me perdone la vida? —¡Me he enamorado de tí! ¡Así que por favor sálvame!

description.fa:
در قسمت های اصلی رمان، من یه فرد شرور بودم که توسط پدر و برادر بزرگترم به عنوان یه ابزار سیاسی استفاده میشدم و در نهایت به دست شوهر آیندم کشته شدم. پدرم برای نجات پادشاهی خودش به شدت به داماد پنجم التماس میکرد که با من ازدواج کنه. مشکل اینه که مردی که قراره باهاش ازدواج کنم، شوالیه افسانه ای شمال، همون مردیه که در نهایت من و تمام خانوادم رو میکشه. "باید راهی برای زنده موندن پیدا کنم." داخل خود رمان چالش های دلهره آور زیادی پیشه رو هس. من باید راهی برای نجات خواهر کوچک شوهرم پیدا کنم، بر ظاهر سرد شوهرم پیروز شم، حمایت مردم شمال رو به دست بیارم و دربرابر اتفاقات عجیب با موجودات عجیبی دووم بیارم که در حال حاضر همه اینا منو به یه فرد انتقام جو تبدیل میکنن. "عاشق توعم!" "پس لطفاً منو نکش!"

description.fr:
Dans le roman, elle est devenue une méchante qui est morte des mains de son mari. Pour être plus précis, elle est devenue un personnage secondaire qui est morte en étant utilisée comme un outil pour un mariage politique par son père et son frère. Un jour, mon satané père est sorti en rampant et a choisi mon cinquième marié. Le problème est que la personne choisie était le meilleur paladin du Nord et la personne même qui me tuera moi et ma famille dans le futur. D’abord, je dois trouver un moyen de vivre. Dans le roman, avant de trouver un moyen de sauver ma belle-sœur qui allait mourir de mes mains, il y a de nombreux défis que je dois surmonter. Par exemple, faire fondre l’extérieur froid de mon mari, gagner les faveurs des gens du Nord et surmonter le mépris du duc. Si je peux surmonter ces défis, ma vie ne sera-t-elle pas sauvée plus tard? «Je suis tombé amoureux de toi !» Alors s’il te plaît, épargne-moi!

---
Une jeune coréenne est réincarnée dans le corps de Rudbeckia de Borgia, la seule fille du pape. Cependant, Rudbeckia est destinée à mourir des mains de son époux après avoir été utilisée comme outil dans un mariage politique. Prenant les devants pour changer son destin, elle décide de gagner l'affection de Izek van Omerta du royaume de Britannia, paladin, neveu du roi et héritier du duché d'Omerta. Rudbeckia pourra-t-elle empêcher le meurtre de sa belle-sœur, assassinat qui lui avait coûté la vie? Et Izek, celui qui est supposé tuer Rudbeckia dans le futur, se rangera-t-il aux côtés de son épouse?

---

description.it:
Nelle righe originali del romanzo, ero una malvagia, usata come strumento politico da mio padre e mio fratello maggiore, che finì per morire per mano del mio futuro marito. Per salvare il suo regno, mio padre pregò disperatamente Isaac di Omerta di sposarmi. Il problema è che l'uomo che dovrei sposare, il leggendario cavaliere del Nord, è lo stesso uomo che finirà per uccidere me e tutta la mia famiglia. Devo trovare un modo per sopravvivere! All'interno del romanzo stesso, ci sono molte sfide scoraggianti: devo trovare un modo per salvare la sorellina di mio marito, conquistare il mio freddo marito e ottenere il sostegno della gente del Nord, che attualmente mi disprezza. "Sono innamorata di lei!" Riuscirò nell'impresa?

---
In un romanzo, è diventata una malvagia che è morta tra le mani di suo marito. Per la precisione, come "attrice" non protagonista, una cattiva che muore dopo essere stata utilizzata come strumento per un matrimonio strategico da suo padre e suo fratello. Un giorno, il mio dannato padre ha strisciato e ha offerto la mia mano al mio quinto sposo. Il problema è che lui è proprio il marito che mi ucciderà e il miglior paladino del nord che in futuro distruggerà la mia famiglia. Per prima cosa, devo trovare un modo per sopravvivere. Nel romanzo ci sono molte difficoltà, come il freddo disprezzo di mio marito, l'odio e il bisogno di controllo dei nordisti e il disprezzo dei contadini, prima di trovare un modo per salvarmi la vita, dovrò risolvere diversi problemi. "Sono innamorata di te!" Quindi, per favore, salvami!

---

description.ko:
판타지 소설 속 남편의 손에 죽는
악역 조연, ‘루드베키아’가 되었다.

이 세계의 망할 아버지는 내 정략결혼 상대를 또 물어왔다.
문제는 그 상대가 바로 날 죽이게 될 남편이라는 것!

일단은 살길을 찾아야 한다.

북부 사람들에게 최대한 무해하게 보이면서
원작에서 내가 죽일 남편의 여동생도 지키고,
남편에겐 사랑에 빠진 척하면 목숨은 살려주지 않을까?

“전 당신한테 반해버렸어요!”

그러니까 제발 살려줘!

description.pt:
Me tornei ‘Rudbeckia’, uma coadjuvante em uma história de fantasia, uma vilã que morre pelas mãos de seu marido. O pior pai do mundo me achou outro parceiro para um casamento político. O problema é, essa pessoa é o marido que vai me matar! Primeiro, preciso achar uma forma para viver. Preciso parecer o mais inofensiva possível para o povo do norte e proteger a irmãzinha do meu marido que matei na história original. Não seria capaz de salvar minha vida se fingisse estar apaixonada pelo meu marido?

“Me apaixonei por você à primeira vista!”

“Então, por favor, me poupe!”

description.ru:
Рудвекиа де Ворхиа является сикстинским ангелом и принцессой Романии, которой предначертано умереть от руки собственного мужа. После того как она стала обычным инструментом в руках верховного понтифика католической церкви и своего старшего брата, она вынуждена вступить в политический брак с лучшим паладином севера, который в будущем должен убить весь ее дом. Теперь девушка должна будет столкнуться с многочисленными трудностями, но ей придется приспособиться и выжить в новых условиях. Сначала ей придется доказать, что она не является опасностью для других людей, потому людям не стоит ее опасаться. Дальше же ей придется убедить всех людей в том, что она совершенно непричастна к делам понтифика и семьи.

description.tr:
Kocasının ellerinde ölen bir kötü kadın karakterin bedenine reenkarne oldum. Daha doğrusu, babası ve erkek kardeşi tarafından siyasi evlilik aracı olarak kullanılırken ölen bir yardımcı karakter oldum. Bir gün, lanet olası babam gitti ve beşinci kocamı seçti. Sorun şu ki, seçilen kişi Kuzey'in en iyi Paladin'i, dahası gelecekte beni ve ailemi öldürecek olan kişiydi. Önce yaşamanın bir yolunu bulmalıyım. Romanda benim ellerimde ölecek olan biricik kız kardeşini kurtarmanın bir yolunu bulmadan önce aşmam gereken birçok zorluk var. Kocamın soğuk yüzünü eritmek, Kuzeyli'nin beğenisini kazanmak ve Dük'ün küçümsemesini yenmek gibi. Bu zorlukların üstesinden gelebilirsem, hayatım sonunda kurtulmuş olmaz mı? "Sana aşık oldum!" Bu yüzden lütfen beni bağışla!

description.uk:
Вона стала злодійкою, яка померла від рук свого чоловіка в романі. Точніше, вона стала другорядною героїнею, яка померла, коли її батько і брат використовували як інструмент політичного шлюбу. По-перше, я маю знайти спосіб вижити у романі, знайти спосіб врятувати сестру мого чоловіка, яка в оригіналі померла від моїх рук, мені потрібно розтопити холодне серце мого чоловіка, завоювати прихильність населення та подолати презирство герцога. Якщо я зможу подолати ці труднощі, чи не буде моє життя врятовано пізніше? «Я закохався в тебе!» Тож будь ласка, пощади мене!

description.vi:
Trong cuốn tiểu thuyết gốc, tôi là một nhân vật phản diện - người được cha và anh trai sử dụng như một công cụ chính trị và cũng là người hết dưới tay chồng tương lai của mình. Để cứu vương quốc, cha tôi đã tuyệt vọng cầu xin chú rể nắm lấy tay tôi và kết hôn. Vấn đề là người đàn ông mà tôi phải kết hôn chính là hiệp sĩ huyền thoại của phương Bắc và cũng là người đàn ông sẽ tiêu diệt tôi và cả gia đình. Tôi phải tìm cách tồn tại. Trong cuốn tiểu thuyết, có rất nhiều thử thách khó khăn dc đặt ra cho tôi: tôi phải tìm cách cứu em gái của chồng mình, giành dc trái tim của người chồng lạnh lùng và có dc sự ủng hộ của người dân phương Bắc và tất cả những người hiện tại coi thường tôi. "Em yêu anh!" Vì vậy, xin anh đừng giết em!!

我成为了在奇幻小说中死在丈夫手中的反派角色‘卢德薇基亚’。 更倒霉的是，父亲又给我找来了一个政治联姻的对象。 问题是，那个人就是要杀掉我的丈夫啊！ 首先要找到活路。 尽可能在北部人面前展示出无害的样子 还要保护在原著中死在我手下的丈夫的妹妹 假装对丈夫陷入爱河会不会挽救我的性命？ “我被你迷住了！” 所以拜托救救我吧！

description.en:
In a world where technology and magic are almost indistinguishable from one another, monsters and creatures of myth and legend reign terror upon mankind. In humanity’s darkest moment, individuals with special god-like powers emerge to save the day. They are — the Awakened.

Meet Jaehyeon, a feeble Awakened human Raider, who struggles to make ends meet until one day a series of confounding events allow him to claim a powerful item that will change the course of history forever…
description.ko:
D급 무투계 레이더,
최강의 귀속 아이템으로
세계를 구할 신의 대적자가 되다!
description.ru: Я получил единственный в мире мифический предмет. Но что? Этот предмет принадлежит мне?

altTitles.pt-br: Hanako-Kun e os mistérios do colégio Kamome

altTitles.es-la: Hanako-kun y los Misterios de la Academia Kamome

altTitles.th: ฮานาโกะคุง วิญญาณติดที่

description.en:
"Hanako-san, Hanako-san… are you there?"  
At Kamome Academy, rumors abound about the school's Seven Mysteries, one of which is Hanako-san. Said to occupy the third stall of the third floor girls' bathroom in the old school building, Hanako-san grants any wish when summoned. Nene Yashiro, an occult-loving high school girl who dreams of romance, ventures into this haunted bathroom… but the Hanako-san she meets there is nothing like she imagined! Kamome Academy's Hanako-san… is a boy!  
  
**Note:** Volume 0 includes the original pilot version of Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun and the debut oneshot of Aida Iro - Dear My Living Dead.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **Hanako si Arwah Penasaran** (2019)
- Korean release by 루트미디어 as **지박소년 하나코군** (2019)
- Polish release by Studio JG as **Hanako : duch ze szkolnej toalety**
- Turkish release by Gerekli Şeyler Yayıncılık as **Tuvalet Hayaleti Hanako-Kun** (2022)
description.id:
Ada rumor tentang tujuh misteri atau lebih dikenal dengan "Nana Fushigi" di Akademi Kamome. Salah satunya adalah “Hanako”, hantu yang menghuni toilet wanita bilik ketiga di lantai 3 gedung sekolah lama. Konon, dia akan mengabulkan apa pun harapan orang yang memanggilnya. Di sisi lain, Nene Yashiro, seorang siswi SMA, melibatkan dirinya dengan makhluk supernatural agar harapannya terkabul. Inilah kisah komedi yang menghangatkan hati tentang Hanako, si hantu toilet, dengan gadis penggemar misteri!

(Sumber: Sinopsis resmi)
description.it: Hanako, una sorta di spiritello noto come uno dei 7 misteri dell'Accademia Kamone, occupa il terzo bagno nei sanitari femminili al terzo piano, nel vecchio palazzo della scuola, e può avverare qualsiasi desiderio quando viene invocato. Un giorno come tanti, Nene Yashiro, una grande amante dell'occulto che sogna il grande amore, s'imbatte in Hanako ma viene colta dalla sorpresa quando scopre che Hanako è proprio un ragazzo! Nene diventa la sua assistente facendo così iniziare le loro avventure tra le varie leggende metropolitane che popolano la scuola.
description.ru:
«Ханако-сан, Ханако-сан… ты там?»  
В академии Камомэ, как и во многих других японских школах существуют «семь школьных тайн», одна из которых легенда о Ханако-сан. Говорят, что если в женском туалете на третьем этаже постучать в третью кабинку, появится Ханако-сан, которая исполнит любое твоё желание…  
Ясиро Нэнэ — обычная школьница, любящая жуткие истории, отправляется в женский туалет, чтобы призвать Ханако-сан и исполнить своё романтическое желание. Но, как оказалось, в академии Камомэ Ханако-сан — это… мальчик.
description.th: มีข่าวลือน่าพิศวงเกี่ยวกับสิ่งลี้ลับทั้งเจ็ดที่เล่าต่อกันมาในโรงเรียนคาโมเมะ ว่ากันว่าในห้องน้ำหญิงห้องที่สามชั้นที่สามของตึกเรียนเก่ามี "คุณฮานาโกะ" ที่จะช่วยให้คำขอร้องของผู้ที่เรียกตนออกมาสมหวังไม่ว่าจะเป็นเรื่องใดก็ตาม เนเนะ ยาชิโระ ผู้ที่มีความปรารถนาว่าอยากจะใจตรงกันกับคนที่ชอบ ก็ได้ลองเข้าไปในห้องน้ำหญิงแล้วลองเรียก "คุณฮานาโกะ คุณฮานาโกะ อยู่หรือเปล่าคะ" ตอนนั้นเองคุณฮานาโกะก็ได้ปรากฏตัวออกมาจริง ๆ ทว่า คุณฮานาโกะคนนั้นกลับเป็นเด็กผู้ชายซะงั้น!
description.es-la:
"Hanako, Hanako... ¿estás ahí?"
En la Academia Kamome, abundan los rumores sobre los Siete Misterios de la escuela, uno de los cuales es Hanako. Se dice que ocupa el tercer puesto del baño de niñas del tercer piso en el antiguo edificio de la escuela, Hanako concede cualquier deseo cuando es convocado. Nene Yashiro, una chica de escuela secundaria que adora el ocultismo que sueña con el romance, se aventura en este baño embrujado, pero el Hanako que conoce no es nada como ella se imaginaba. ¡Hanako de la academia Kamome en realidad es un niño!

altTitles.ja: ようこそ実力至上主義の教室へ 2年生編

altTitles.ru: Добро пожаловать в класс превосходства - Второй год

description.en: The second spring at the Advanced Nurturing High School is welcoming Ayanokoji and Class D. The special exams aren't only what awaits them, but the unique freshmen as well. Kazuomi Hōsen and Ryūen. The two who shared the bad reputation between themselves during Ryuen's middle school days. Takuya Yagami, who proclaims to come from the same middle school as Kushida, is approaching her. And the capricious Ichika Amasawa who is pulling Ayanokoji left and right.
description.pt-br: A cortina sobe e o arco do segundo ano dessa série extremamente popular começa!Quando Kiyotaka Ayanokouji e seus colegas de classe começam seu segundo ano, mudanças são vistas em toda a Tokyo Metropolitan Advanced Nurturing High School. Com a graduação do terceiro ano e a entrada do primeiro ano na escola, as alianças estão bem encaminhadas. Além disso, agora que Miyabi Nagumo é o presidente do conselho estudantil, a promessa de transformar a escola em uma baseada meritocracia pode se tornar uma realidade. Enquanto isso, os conflitos entre as classes continuam a crescer à medida que o total de pontos da classe se aproxima. Com outro exame especial se aproximando, Ayanokouji permanecerá nas sombras, ou ele finalmente entrará nos holofotes e ajudará sua classe a subir para a ilustre Classe A?

altTitles.ja: ちがう宮原おまえじゃない！

altTitles.zh: 我要找的、才不是宫原你啦！

description.en: The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. (Source: [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
description.ja: 憧れの女子”雪比良さん”と仲良くなるべく奮闘する有馬！ でもなぜか、いつもイイところであらわれるのは…。 末永〜く見守りたい！中学生３人の青春ラブコメ、ここに開幕っ！
description.vi: Câu chuyện diễn biến xung quanh Arima - một cậu bạn sơ trung phải lòng một bạn nữ cùng lớp tên Yukihira. Nhưng mỗi khi cậu ấy chuẩn bị tiến gần hơn với Yukihara thì cô bạn thuở nhỏ Miyahara lại bất chợt xuất hiện lúc nào chẳng hay làm cho mọi người lầm tưởng rằng Arima đang nhắm đến cô bạn đó hơn là Yukihara.
description.pt-br: Arima, é um garoto apaixonado por uma garota chamada Yukihira. Mas toda vez que ele tenta ficar mais próximo de Yukihira, sua outra amiga, Miyahara simplesmente entra em cena e sempre pensa erroneamente que Arima está fazendo seus movimentos por ela.

title.en: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!

altTitles.ja: ドローイング 最強漫画家はお絵かきスキルで異世界無双する！

altTitles.en: Drawing: The Greatest Mangaka Becomes a Skilled “Martial Artist” in Another World

altTitles.zh-hk: 作畫 最強漫畫家利用繪畫技能在異世界開無雙！

description.en:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
description.pt-br: Akira Kamidai lamenta ter conseguido construir apenas uma relação vazia, embora tenha feito muito sucesso como cartunista. Uma vida em um lugar medíocre onde eu queria que Akira fosse uma pessoa com magia. Reencarnação em uma loja voltada para a esgrima. Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Eu estava vivendo uma vida ideal para uma família amada por espadachins. Descobri a habilidade de trapaça que encarnar várias coisas atravéz de um ”desenho”…? Uma aventura mundial diferente para proteger seu paradeiro, tecida por Akira que quer levar uma vida normal...!

description.en: A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

altTitles.en: I Can't Choose a Childhood Friend!

description.en: I fell in love with my childhood friend, but we ended up separated. Now, after 10 years, I'm finally reunited with her! However, just as I started looking forward to an amazing school life with her, I found out that she was... not alone...?

A naga starts a new job in a new town.

Posted with [author permission](https://twitter.com/DanielLCarrier/status/1769140595296207140).

---

title.en: Dainana Maouji Zilbagias no Maou Keikokuki

altTitles.ja: 第七魔王子ジルバギアスの魔王傾国記

altTitles.en: Zilbagias the Demon Prince: How the Seventh Prince Brought Down the Kingdom
Seventh Demon Prince Jilbagias' Chronicle of Overthrowing the Demon Kingdom
7th Demon Prince Jilbagias, the Demon Kingdom Destroyer

description.en:
The hero Alexander and his comrades unleash a daring raid on the Demon King’s castle, intent on assassinating him and bringing an end to the war against the darkness in one fell swoop. However, the raid goes awry when his party is effortlessly decimated by the Demon King’s overwhelming power.

But death is not the end of the road for Alexander, as he is reincarnated two years later as that very same Demon King’s son. With the memories of his past life still intact, he vows to use his miraculous second chance to continue fighting—this time destroying the demonic kingdom from within as the Demon Prince Zilbagias.

It doesn’t take long for his mettle to be tested either, as passing as a young demon prince without blowing his cover proves to be quite a bit more challenging than he initially anticipated.

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/zilbagias-the-demon-prince-how-the-seventh-prince-brought-down-the-kingdom)
description.fr: Alexandre, dont la ville natale a été détruite par la race démoniaque, s'est battu avec le Roi Démon et a été tué. Mais au lieu d'être accueilli dans l'au-delà, lorsqu'il ouvre les yeux, il renaît sous les traits du fils du roi des démons, Jilbagias ? Tout en cachant sa véritable identité, il se souille les mains d'atrocités en se conduisant comme le prince démon idéal, augmentant son pouvoir pour finalement renverser le royaume des démons...

description.en:
In a world where human lands were invaded by kaijuu-like dragons, a boy meets one that can take the form of a little girl.
___
**Winner of the 108th Weekly Shounen Magazine Rookie Manga Award**

[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10614/episode/352837)
description.pt-br: Em um mundo onde os humanos foram invadidos por dragões semelhantes a kaiju, um menino encontra um que pode assumir a forma de uma garotinha.

altTitles.th: บันทึกรักเจ้าหญิงหนอนหนังสือ

description.ar: الأمير كريستوفر خطيبته اسمها “إليانا” ، وهي امرأة نبيلة تستمتع بقراءة الكتب طوال اليوم. في يوم مصيري ، قيل لـ “إليانا” أن هناك امرأة نبيلة أخرى يعتز بها الأمير. على الفور ظنت أنه وقع في حبها !! وبينما كانت تفكر في الأمر بدأت “إليانا” بإعداد موعد إلغاء خطوبتها. كتاب امرأة محبوبة تسببت في الكثير من سوء الفهم ، تبدأ قصة خيالية رومانسية!
description.de: Die Familie von Eliana Bernstein ist als eine belesene Dynastie bekannt und verfügt über eine stattliche Sammlung an Büchern. Eines Tages möchte Prinz Christopher Eliana zu seiner Verlobten machen und ihr obendrein freien Zugriff auf die königliche Bibliothek gewähren. Auf Rat ihres Bruders willigt Eliana ein und verschlingt am Hof des Prinzen ein Werk nach dem anderen. Mit ihrem umfangreichen Wissen steht sie vielen Menschen im Palast zur Seite, sodass sie rasch hohes Ansehen genießt. Doch noch ahnt Eliana nicht, dass ihr Leben bald selbst einer Tragödie gleichen wird, wie sie in keinem Buche steht… Band 1 der mitreißenden Fantasy-Lovestory enthält eine entzückende ShoCo Card in der Erstauflage!
description.en:
The crown prince Christopher's fiancée (albeit only in name), Elianna, is a noble lady that spends all her time reading books. On one fateful day, Elianna finds out that the prince was apparently being affectionate with a noble lady. Finally, she thought, a girl who actually loves the prince has appeared! With what she thought she had learned in mind, Elianna began to prepare for the inevitable cancellation of her engagement… A romance and fantasy story full of the misunderstandings and resulting shenanigans of a book-loving noble lady starts here!  

---
When book-loving Lady Elianna spots Prince Christopher-her betrothed in name only-consorting with another noble lady, she realizes the recent rumors must be true. The prince has someone he truly loves, which means the annulment of their engagement is both inevitable and fast-approaching. What she doesn't realize is that this is merely a surface ripple-one of many where the truth runs deep, in a conspiracy surpassing her imagination!
description.es: El príncipe heredero, la prometida de Christopher, aunque sólo en nombre, Eliana, es una dama noble que disfruta de su vida leyendo libros todo el día. Un día fatídico, Eliana terminó sabiendo que había una dama noble con la que aparentemente el príncipe era cariñosa. Al instante, pensó que una chica que realmente amaba al príncipe apareció!! Y, mientras pensaba en eso, Eliana comenzó a prepararse para el momento próximo en que se cancelaría su compromiso…
description.fr: Eliana est une noble qui profite de la vie en lisant tous les jours des livres d'où son surnom de «Princesse bibliophilique.» Un jour, le prince hériter Christopher la choisit comme fiancée temporaire. Cependant, quatre années plus tard, Eliana finit par découvrir qu'il y avait une noble dame avec laquelle le prince était très affectueux. Instantanément, elle a cru que le prince avait enfin trouvé le vrai amour! Et c'est avec cette pensée en tête et en ayant le cœur brisé qu'elle commence à se préparer pour la prochaine étape: mettre fin à ses fiançailles!
description.it: Elianna, fidanzata (anche se solo per nome) del principe ereditario Christopher, è una ragazza nobile che trascorre tutto il suo tempo a leggere libri. Un giorno scopre che il principe è affezionato a un'altra nobile fanciulla. "Finalmente", pensa Elianna, "è apparsa una ragazza che ama davvero il principe!". Con questo pensiero in testa, Elianna inizia i preparativi per l'inevitabile annullamento del suo fidanzamento... Una storia romantica fantasy piena di incomprensioni e i conseguenti imbrogli di una ragazza nobile amante dei libri inizia proprio da qui!
description.ja: 王太子であるクリストファー殿下の名ばかりの婚約者として日々を過ごしてきた本好きな侯爵令嬢のエリアーナ。そんなある日、エリアーナは王太子が仲睦まじくしている令嬢の存在を知ってしまう。ついに殿下に本当に愛する女性が現れた！そう感じたエリアーナは婚約解消を覚悟し始めて…。「一迅社アイリスNEO」の話題作、本好き令嬢の勘違いラブファンタジーが、ついに開幕です！
description.ko:
왕태자인 크리스토퍼 전하의 허울뿐인 약혼녀로서 살아온 책을 좋아하는 후작영애 엘리아나. 
어느 날, 엘리아나는 왕태자와 친밀하게 지내는 영애의 존재를 알아차리고 만다. 
드디어 전하가 진심으로 사랑하는 여성이 나타난 것이다! 
그렇게 생각한 엘리아나는 약혼 파기를 각오하게 되었는데……. 

책을 좋아하는 영애의 착각계 러브판타지, 드디어 개막!
description.vi: Eliana là một người yêu sách và cũng là vị hôn thê của hoàng tử Christopher. Một ngày nọ cô biết đến sự tồn tại của một cô gái có lẽ đã dành được sự quý mến của hoàng tử. Ngay lập tức cô nghĩ rằng đây hẳn là cô gái thực sự yêu vẻ bề ngoài của hoàng tử. Và ngay lúc ấy cô lại bắt đầu chuẩn bị đón nhận cái ngày hôn ước của cô bị hủy bỏ. Cô gái quý tộc yêu sách bắt đầu có những hiểu lầm, câu chuyện lãng mạn và giả tưởng cuối cùng đã bắt đầu.

altTitles.zh: Fate kaleid liner 魔法少女☆伊莉雅

altTitles.ja: Fate/kaleid liner プリズマ☆イリヤ ドライ! !

description.en:
Just as Miyu was about to be saved from being swallowed by despair, all of a sudden mysterious duo that mastered Heroic Spirit Class Card system appears in front of Illya!  
  
(A direct continuation of the second act, "2wei" - manga upholds the tradition of having punny names based on german numbers and was appropriately titled "3rei", which comes from deutsch "drei" meaning "three".)  


---
description.fr:
Il s'agit d'un spin-off de la série Fate/Stay Night.  
  
Rin Tohsaka est une mage chargée par Zelretch de collecter les cartes des sept servants dispersées dans la ville de Fuyuki. Malheureusement, elle découvre qu'elle ne peut pas utiliser la magie de Ruby, son sceptre.  
Rin va alors découvrir en Illyasviel von Einzbern un potentiel pour devenir magical girl à sa place. Illya va alors utiliser le Kaleido Stick Ruby pour collecter les cartes tout en étant supervisée par Rin.  
  
La petite fille va également découvrir une rivale et amie de taille nommée Miyu Edelfelt, qui avait pour maître Luviagelita Edelfelt, la rivale de Rin.  
  
Par ailleurs, pendant la collecte de cartes, Illya va découvrir une autre jeune fille lui ressemblant étrangement : Kuroe. Cette dernière n'a pas l'intention de la laisser remplir sa mission et tente de l'éliminer.

description.en: Shen Chu, burdened with an incomplete soul, heads to Zhuo Lu, the cultivation world's most prestigious academy, with a very specific goal in mind. Upon his arrival, his world, previously dimmed by his incomplete soul, unexpectedly brightens due to a young man with striking blue hair. Could this be the person Shen Chu has been searching for? As he navigates the relaxing day-to-day life of academy studies, Shen Chu soon finds a complex web of intertwined timelines and ancient conspiracies unraveling around him, revealing secrets that could change everything.
